Uses of Interface
com.archibus.datasource.DataSource

Packages that use DataSource
com.archibus.datasource   
com.archibus.datasource.data This package contains the DataSource data classes. 
 

Uses of DataSource in com.archibus.datasource
 

Subinterfaces of DataSource in com.archibus.datasource
 interface ObjectDataSource<T>
          ObjectDataSource is an extension of the DataSource interface.
 

Classes in com.archibus.datasource that implement DataSource
 class DataSourceGroupingImpl
          DataSource implementation that supports groupBy fields.
 class DataSourceImpl
           The DataSource is a programming interface to Web Central data access layer.
 class ObjectDataSourceImpl<T>
          Base class for implementations of the ObjectDataSource interface.
